summary: Maven Dependency Resolution and Build Orchestration

message.content: Analyze the performance of the maven-plugin. Can it be improved while staying 100% accurate

content.text: I'll analyze the Maven plugin performance and identify potential improvements while maintaining 100% accuracy.

todos.content: Analyze current Maven plugin structure and identify performance bottlenecks
Review Java Maven plugin code for optimization opportunities
Examine TypeScript plugin wrapper for performance issues
Test current performance baseline with timing measurements
Document findings and recommendations

content.content: Todos have been modified successfully. Ensure that you continue to use the todo list to track your progress. Please proceed with the current tasks if applicable

content.content:
